title: PasswordBox with InputScope=NumericPin locks keyboard for other controls
body: Please fix this bug: Once a passwordBox with an InputScope=NumericPin is rendered the keyboard becomes stuck as a number pad and does not return to the full keyboard. Described nicely here: https://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/vstudio/en-US/d54a77b9-9a47-4feb-81c0-be662639792e/soft-input-panel-does-not-change-back-from-numericpin-mode?forum=wpdevelop

comments.body: @Clint, can you comment on the status of this? We have just encountered the issue in our project. We are targeting 14393 and are also testing on 14393.
